title: Kirk Minihane Facilitates An On-Air Interview Between The People's CEO Erika Nardini & Blind Mike
description:
After months of badgering, Kirk Minihane caves to Blind Mike and gets him a job interview on the show directly with CEO Erika Nardini. Mike pitches himself like only he can. The guys also talk about Linda Marks beautifully moving tribute song to David Ortiz.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
